author: wn.com
title: Minimum Wage Compliance Essential to Level Playing Field for Retailers (ACS - Association of Convenience ...
text: ( Source : ACS - Association of Convenience Stores ) ACS called on retailers to ensure that they are fully aware of and compliant with the national minimum wage rates. Government has published a list of over 100 employers who have fallen short
